page.title: 05INTERVIEW WITH HEADMASTER.
page.content: C) ENGLISH- 8. D) SCIENCE- 7. E) FRENCH- 4. F) PHYSICAL EDUCATION- 4. G) CREATIVE DESIGN - 8. H) DRAMA- 3. I) MUSIC- 3. {12,WHAT SUBJECT'S DO YOU TEACH ? I TEACH MUSIC AND I USED TO TEACH HISTORY,SOCIAL EDUCATION AND RELIGOUS EDUCATION. {13,WHEN FRIESLAND SCHOOL WAS BUILT,WAS {IT BUILT WITH THE SPORTS CENTRE ? NO.THE SPORTS CENTRE WAS BUILT AFTERWARDS BECAUSE IT IS UNDER A DIFFERENT AUTHORITY. {14,WHEN WAS THE NEW GYM BUILT ? IN 1974. {15,HOW MANY PLAYING FIELDS ARE THERE ? THERE IS ONE.
